dialogues.text: Now, gentlemen. What better way to dream than to walk in the shoes of those to whom we aspire? Mr. Pickles, fetch the--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clogs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (brandishing cricket bat) BAT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheese.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher walks away as Trout and Pickles blanche. Their f go from rapt attention to apprehension. Gristle just keep his deranged grin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh dear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice! Heh heh heh heh heh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheesebridge looms quietly overhead. The camera slowly pa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs reaches an intersection and stops at the street sign MILK AVE and CURDS WAY. He looks around at the industrial wasteland. In the distance is one lone building with a bl red top hat painted on the huge wooden door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs heads toward it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON Snatcher's grimy hands holding up a white hat ma out of paper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Men, don your white hats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher lowers the paper hat onto his head. Across the t from him the Redhats replace their red hats with paper wh hats. They all sit at a table set with cracked crockery a mismatched plates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you sure about this, boss? You know what cheese can do to you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tucking a napkin into his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unless you are referring to how cheese brings men of respect and power together in brotherhood, no, I do not know what...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Cheese. Does. To. Me."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GULPS) That's what I meant then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marvelous! Then let us begin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout takes a little piece of cheese out of a package lab "EXTRA MILD CHEDDAR". He focuses and cuts off the tiniest little sliver and puts it on a plate, inspects it and sli it into an even smaller piece... then slices it again... again... and again... and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ENOUGH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher bangs his fist on the table. Startled, Pickles a Trout jump. Then Trout puts a tiny slice of cheese on a p and very slowly rotates the top of the table like a Lazy Susan. It takes forever for Snatcher's plate to arrive in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher loses patience and spins the table so that a pla lands in front of him. As he moves to pierce the cheese w his fork, the plate shifts to the left. He glares at Mr. Trout and Mr. Pickles, who turned the table top. They immediately return the plate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Redhats stare nervously as Snatcher stabs the curd an raises it to his lips and places it on his tongue. He che relishing it, then swallows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmmm!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Redhats relax. They take a tiny piece of cheese each eat it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say, old chaps, it's quite, um...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Aromatic? Oaky? With an undertone of a mother's smile on a warm spring day? Hmm...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! Those things! Etcetera etcetera, big words, chummy banter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Redhats look on in horror, red spots appear across Snatcher's face. He scratches at them absently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispered to Trout) Someone's got the cheese fits again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohhh... (whispered to Gristle) Quickly, quietly, get the leeches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle scurries away, crossing behind Snatcher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUIETLY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he going? Is he getting more cheese?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher's lips instantly PUFF UP into huge, wobbly, distended FISH LIPS. The Redhats stare--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quietly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you've had enough for today, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background, Eggs' silhouette appears in the soot- covered window. He wipes away the grime to look in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks away from the window up at a large, rickety AI DUCT attached to the side of the building. He climbs into duct, leaving his disguise behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK TO SCENE. Snatcher's face is now grotesquely misshap and one eye has swollen shut like Quasimodo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (slurred by swollen lips) Isn't this nice? Chewing the cheddar with the big cheessses. Holding my own--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --With sssophissstication and sssavoir faire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles, and Trout sit nervously at the table and stare a him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yup. Nothing terrifying about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rubs his neck, nervously) Uh huh huh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thisss is where I belong!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leans back in his "throne" and begins orating again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spot on, as always, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs appears peeking out of the air duct high on the fact wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not wrong, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well not here! In this rotten factory!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher quickly leans forward, slams his fist on the tab and stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I belong up there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs shrinks back into the duct, afraid that Snatcher has noticed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm agreeing so I don't upset you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very clever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON SNATCHER as he lurches up from the table and points to the city. Eggs retreats slightly into the duct in respons Snatcher's erratic movements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the tasting room, supping on the choicest cheeses... Everyone in town bowing down to me, like a gentleman, a lord with a white hat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS: He spots Fish in a cage suspended above the floo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He   leaps onto a hanging chain and climbs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've never been wrong, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a time-honored tradition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background, Snatcher stands up quickly, sending hi chair flying and stalks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaarrgh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs climbs across the rafters, above the Redhats as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, now boss... Don't get yourself all worked up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use your breathing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Pickles and Trout follow Snatcher nervously, like guard an insane asylum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON SNATCHER: as they move in to comfort him but he rails at them, arms flailing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stand back peasants! You don't touch your King!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS: as he works his way through ceiling girders. He jumps from the rafters to a loose chain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: King Archibald Snatcher. Yes, I shall be king too, why not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay with us, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell us more about when you'll be king.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs lands quietly. He peeks out from behind a crate and sees Snatcher climb onto the table to get away from Trout Pickles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE won't let me! That pompous Portley-Rind and his gaggle of giggling sycophants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish's cage hangs in between.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, now Boss, you be careful up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs runs to Fish's hanging cage and climbs on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father always said if you worked hard, you'd get a white hat! And what did he ever get! NOTHING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish hides in his box making the cage swing and SQUEAK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON GRISTLE: In the corner where he leans into a filthy FI TANK pulling out slimy, wriggly LEECHES and dropping them into a jar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle jerks up and hones in on the sound like a bat. He stares as the cage slowly spins threatening to reveal Egg

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry Mr. Gristle, were losing him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle turns back to harvesting leeches just as Eggs swi into view. PHEW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs swings himself back out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've worked my hump off for this town!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And it's growing back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wading through wet garbage in the middle of the night, crawling after monsters! What has Portley-Rind ever done. Eat some cheese, run the government, NOTHING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON FISH: as Eggs watches the Redhats argue. Snatcher unsteadily climbs on top of the table and continues his tirade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What has Portley-Rind ever done. Eat some cheese, run the government, NOTHING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish pokes his head back out of his box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggggs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on down from there, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs throws the lock on Fish's cage and hops down, holdin the door open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just put one giant blob-shaped foot in front of the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go... Come on, come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish shuffles out of the cage, murmuring with fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll rip that hat off of Portley- Rind's head... WHOA HOAH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUNK! Fish hides in his box and Eggs hunkers down as if had a box, but Snatcher wasn't talking to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boss, boss!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boss!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON SNATCHER: He has lost his balance and crashed to the floor. Trout and Pickles twist their hands, unsure of wha do, as Snatcher lays atop the broken table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm alright. Just give me a hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher holds up his cheese-covered hand and the hand suddenly SWELLS UP into a grotesque meat glove!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ugh. Mother of sausages!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy meat glove!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks horrified at the sight of Snatcher's giant han

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish won't come out of the box so Eggs is forced to lug h like a sack of concrete to the wall beneath the heating d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout and Pickles help Snatcher up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Upsy daisy now, boss. Let's get you a nice cuppa tea--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher SMACKS Trout away with his swollen hand - (YELP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAH! Mister Snatcher!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- and stares at Pickles. His eyes are swollen nearly shu and blink spastically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNATCHER'S POV: Blurry and distorted at first, then, at e blink, Pickles morphs into Lord Portley-Rind, white hat a all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... What is it, Mr. Snatcher?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GIVE ME THAT HAT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He LUNGES AT PICKLES (AHHHH!) and chokes him with his gia cheese hand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll make those brie stuffed pigs bow down to me! I'm going to be somebody!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles wrestles Snatcher's swollen face into a headlock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHH! I got him! Do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MR. GRISTLE NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOW! NOW! NOW!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle runs up and hurls the jar of leeches onto Snatche face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LEECHES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHHH! UGH. OOF. GAHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher grunts and yells then everything goes silent, ex for the sucking sound of the leeches. Mr. Trout shrinks a and Mr. Gristle grins, enjoying the spectacle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS: Eggs is horrified by the sight of the leeches sucking on Snatcher's swollen face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eww!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have got to help me, Fish!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gurgles) Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish sticks his right arm out of the box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (groan) Uggggh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs grabs Fish's arm and swings the whole box over his shoulder so he is wearing Fish like a back pack. Then Egg grabs a pipe on the wall and climbs toward the duct.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They swell up larger and larger as Snatcher's face shrink back down to normal. They drop off one at a time and squi at Snatcher's feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher flicks off the last few leeches and flips his ha His face is marred with red spots from the suckers but ha returned to its normal size.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, hello. Where were we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We was about to... uhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly, gestures with the empty jar) Leeches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Put that new boxtroll to work. Ain't that right, Mr. Pickles?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Pickles stumbles over, rubbing his sore neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is correct.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah yes... right. Open the workshop Mr. Trout!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout runs to a lever and pulls it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The factory is filled with load-grinding sounds as a stea wheel turns. Huge timbers in the wooden floor PULL OPEN, REVEALING A DARK PIT BELOW in the FACTORY SUB-LEVEL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs and Fish are still a few feet short of the air duct. Eggs heaves Fish halfway into the duct and has to stretch over empty space to push him in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher and the Redhats reach Fish's empty cage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? Where is the beast?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs pushes Fish half into the duct while hanging from th swinging cage. Fish is looking straight down, suddenly hi eyes go wide!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs follows his gaze and looks down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasps) But.. you're all alive!?

dialogues.speaker: BIG REVEAL
dialogues.text: in chains! They surround a massive, unrecognizable machin They work on different sections drilling, welding, wrench etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oil Can looks up and spots Eggs and Fish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs! Eggs! EGGS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then amidst all the weird gurgling a HUMAN VOICE calls ou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks and sees a strange man HANGING UP SIDE DOWN amongst the boxtrolls. His head is covered with a wild mo tangled hair and a long beard and mustache dangle from hi face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles looks up and spots Eggs straddling the cage and t duct. He points up, the Redhats follow his gaze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There he is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher stares at Eggs' dirty, panicked face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It can't be. It's not possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's our boxtroll! Give `im back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't stand there gawking. Get him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chase time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle laughs with delight and bolts off, tossing his wh paper hat to the ground. Snatcher looks to Trout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Trout!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Trout pulls a lever and the cage Eggs is standing on jerks up. Fish falls the rest of the way into the duct an disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cage drops! Eggs leaps onto a rafter as the cage cras to the factory floor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TEN YEARS and NOW you show up?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks down as the floor closes over the boxtroll prisoners faces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggggs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing with them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll find out soon enough!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles runs past fumbling with a bolas gun as Gristle le onto the nearest hanging cage and points at Trout with hi cricket bat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout pulls a lever and Gristle rides the cage up into th rafters like a pirate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'M FLYING ON A CAGE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leaps off the cage and grips his cricket bat with his teeth. He swings through the rafters on ropes, all the wh laughing like a maniac. He lands in front of Eggs and swi the bat aloft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HA! (swings) RAH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs shrieks and runs across the skinny girders. Gristle follows on his heels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOOT MR. PICKLES! Shoot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles nervously aims his bolas gun at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'd be easier if he'd stop moving!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle runs behind Eggs, swinging his bat at his head. E avoids being hit but loses his footing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop moving!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs falls, hits a beam hard, and grabs the bottom edge o girder. He hangs there, an easy shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle raises his bat to strike. Pickles fumbles for the trigger. There's no way they can miss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (defiant, scared) Boxtrolls don't hurt anyone! Let them go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, well, I need them. They're my ticket to a white hat, Trubshaw Baby!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRUBSHAW BABY!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone freezes and whirls around. Pickle's shoots distractedly - POP! - but the net misses Eggs and loops around a rafter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie stands in the open doorway of the factory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew there was something strange about you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie notices Gristle wielding a cricket bat, Pickles a and Snatcher looking sheepish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miss Portley-Rind! What a surprise!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does your.. does your father know you're here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No of course not! (up to Eggs) But wait til I tell him! The Trubshaw Baby! Alive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie sees Trout towering over her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, miss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie looks at Snatcher in horror and confusion. Trout p her up in his big hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Unhand me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like the Boxtrolls have a new victim, miss. And her name is YOU.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle remembers Eggs. He swings his bat over his head a brings it down but Eggs leaps, grabs the rope from Pickle missed shot, and SWINGS LIKE TARZAN towards the door that Winnie opened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout panics as he sees Eggs swinging towards him. He hol Winnie up to protect his face. Eggs barrels into Trout's belly, knocking him backward and getting him wedged in th door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs and Winnie tumble outside the factory and roll to a in a cloud of dust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're getting away Mr. Gristle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have you dragged me into?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish calls to them from a manhole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs! Eggs! Eggs! Eggs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RUN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs and Winnie run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still running Eggs and Winnie suddenly hear a loud CRASH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind them Gristle comes crashing through a high window swinging on a chain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm swinging on a chain!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs and Winnie slide into the manhole that Fish holds op They make it in and slam it shut just in time for Mr. Gri to face plant on top of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuck on a manhole!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout finally pops out of the factory doorway. He and Mr. Pickles come running up to the motionless Mr. Gristle, standing over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oww...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't make no sense. That's evil prevailing over good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher arrives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If Lord Portley-Rind finds out that boy is alive, it will ruin everything I've worked for!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean, we worked for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher glares at Mr. Trout, silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we're all saying the same thing here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think we are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher walks away, frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, just in different ways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie screams as she flies down the chutes, into the cav down the conveyor belt, and crashes into the boxtroll sleeping pile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie lays amongst the scattered boxes. She pushes herse upright, coughing. Boxtrolls poke their heads out all aro her and stare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasp) Ohh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie gets as far away from the boxtrolls as she can, bumping into Knickers as she shuffles backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STAY AWAY FROM ME! Someone, help!!! Wealthy girl in danger!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pushes herself against a wall. The boxtrolls gather, curious. Winnie spots Shoe nearby, with worms and bugs dangling from his mouth. She hides behind a cabbage, whimpering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're going to eat me just get it over with. I'm sure I'm delicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly there is the sound of happy boxtrolls gurgling a drumming their boxes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie peeks out. The boxtrolls are surrounding Eggs and and celebrating their return. No one is paying any attent to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GURGLING EXCITED HELLOS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not just us. All the others are alive too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We saw them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (behind the crowd) What's going on?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oil Can, Wheels, all of them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, but The Redhats have them building something in their factory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said what's going on? Why aren't they ripping out our eyeballs and eating our faces?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls wince at the sound of Winnie's screaming vo and some of them drop into their boxes. Eggs turns to loo her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And where are the rivers of blood and mountains of bones?! I WAS PROMISED MOUNTAINS OF BONES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest of the boxtrolls squeak in fear and drop into th boxes. Eggs looks pointedly at the boxtrolls, then back a Winnie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I TOLD you, we don't eat people!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you keep saying "we"? You're not one of them! You're a boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No I'm not, I'm a boxtroll! Eggs the boxtroll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to his box like it's the most obvious thing in world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh really? Then let's see you fit in your box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I can't right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mm hmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm long-boned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The surrounding boxtrolls gurgle in agreement with Eggs. as his argument with Winnie gets louder the boxtrolls shr away from the two humans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't talk like them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I- I have a speech impediment!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your ears aren't pointy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tugging on his ears) I slept on them funny!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie is getting exasperated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh for goodness sake. Give me your hand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie lunges forward and grabs Eggs' hand, but he resist

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't bite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs stops resisting and she quickly unwraps the rags fro his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie takes Fish's hand and holds it up next to Eggs han

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See? You're not like them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She drops Fish's hand and holds up her own. She presses h hand to his hand, five fingers to five fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're one of us. You're a boy, Eggs. Or should I call you the Trubshaw baby?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat. Eggs pulls his hand away and stares at it, his fa confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then he looks at Fish, who is looking at his own hand in bemusement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not true is it Fish? I'm a boxtroll like you, aren't I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish shakes his head, "No". Eggs looks dumbstruck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See?! I was right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now admit it, admit you stole him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gurglegurglegurgle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he confessing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He says I was... given to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha, right again! I- ...wait, what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie and Eggs are both flabbergasted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was given to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish nods his head. Yup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs' legs give way beneath him.    He stumbles back and down on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who gave me to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish starts gurgling and keeps gurgling, his face suggest that he's conveying something from long-long ago...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie stands by Eggs, watching Fish curiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he saying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, sorry. He says a long time ago there was a kind man--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish and Shoe stand beside a rubbish bin, tinkering with WHIRLIGIG CONTRAPTION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- The one man in town who saw they weren't monsters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SFX: A baby GIGGLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish and Shoe startle and hide in their boxes. The whirli clatters to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... But builders... like him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV FISH: Herbert Trubshaw stands at an open window to hi second-floor workshop, holding a BABY in his arms. Instea chasing them away he SMILES at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish and Shoe slowly lift their heads out of their boxes, returning the smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANOTHER NIGHT: Herbert, baby Eggs, and Fish sit on the ba stoop and discuss an invention. As Herbert talks, Fish casually takes it from him and tweaks it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've tried adjusting the dongle and there doesn't seem to be any possible solut-- Oh look, you've solved it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish laughs with Herbert. Herbert hands Baby Eggs to Fish and he holds the child at arm's length.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's up for a jelly break?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish stares at Baby Eggs as Herbert eats a spoonful of je They smile at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tell you I could eat this stuff for the rest of my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANOTHER NIGHT: Fish and Shoe enter the back yard and free as they step into light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But one night...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the second story windows, menacing silhouettes of Snat and Gristle loom over Herbert, who clutches baby Eggs to chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher's muffled voice can be heard threatening Herbert the baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! I'm being reasonable. I can be unreasonable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher wanted him to build something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I-- I'm an inventor, not a killer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs (V.O.) But he refused...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish stares up at the window.    At Snatcher's loud threa Shoe runs away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And when the Redhats tried to take me away from him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher's silhouette moves menacingly towards Herbert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe if I hold on to your son...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert shoves Snatcher away. Snatcher growls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not my boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert kicks Gristle and opens the window. He places the baby into a box pulley system that dangles from the upper floors. He untethers the rope, yelling to Fish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RUN! PROTECT MY--UGHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert is tackled by Gristle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish watches the crying baby lower to the ground in an Eg box. He is frozen with fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then they...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher CLUBS Herbert across the head and Herbert goes d hard. Dead. The baby CRIES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher looks out the window, panting from exertion, and sees Fish staring up in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thunder BOOMS, lightning FLASHES, and RAIN POURS DOWN as bolts through the gate and out of the yard with Baby Eggs still in the Eggs box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs holds his box, staring forlornly down at his label.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They killed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish is silent. Eggs bows his head and walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie and the boxtrolls watch him quietly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs sits alone on the edge of his nook, looking out over cavern. Winnie quietly walks up and sits next to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think that kind man was your father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks up, confused) What's a father?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has to think.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um... well... a father is the one who raises you... looks after you. Loves you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh! Like Fish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie looks at Fish, who bends down to lap water from a bucket of water like a dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... No. They're supposed to be like that man in the story. Someone who'll do anything to help you. They always listen and never get angry...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie warms to this conversation. She's half talking to herself. Eggs hangs on every word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They guide you when you don't know what to do. They're there when it's dark and you're scared or lonely, and they are never, ever too busy to talk to you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie stops, suddenly sad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have a father!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs stands, bouncing excitedly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can tell him I'm the Trubshaw Baby... and the boxtrolls didn't eat me. And he'll stop Snatcher!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, he doesn't really listen to children.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a father, isn't he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know what he's like.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he's the only father we have.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs grabs Winnie by the shoulders. He releases her when shies away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please help us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie SIGHS.   She stands to meet Eggs, eyeing him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I agree to help, you have to do exactly as I say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I promise!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, first thing's first... off with the box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs GULPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wide-eyed Fish stands holding Eggs' EMPTY BOX. Around h other Boxtrolls stare horrified at a boxless Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAAAAAAh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs screams along with the boxtrolls, holding his chest. Winnie points, reprimanding the howling crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls instantly shut up - more afraid of Winnie t a boxless boxtroll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, you petty thieves. Bring me your loot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The watching boxtrolls look excited -- `That's easy'! The race off in different directions..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Winnie tears a large piece of BLUE FABRIC in half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Specs offers her an arm-load of PEWTER CUPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -   Shoe offers Winnie his OLD ALARM CLOCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Winnie threads a needle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Specs offers Winnie a pair of LAMPS, she takes the SHAD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This might work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Shoe offers Winnie a SAW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoe growls and walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Bucket offers Winnie a JAR OF BUTTONS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Winnie holds up the jar and selects a BUTTON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Shoe offers Winnie a TOILET PLUNGER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoe angrily tosses the plunger aside and storms off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Fragile offers Winnie a pair of shoes. She excitedly sw them from his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fragile is frightened and hides, whimpering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL Eggs in the broken mirror dressed in a surprisingl fashionable suit made of trash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks like the Little Lord Fauntleroy of the junk yard

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look like a proper boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls look like proud parents. They nod and grumb in approval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks at his warped reflection in an old, broken mir He looks stunned by his own transformation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me... a proper boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs smiles sweetly, standing tall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do we get out of this place?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MOMENT LATER: Specs turns an ANCHOR attached to the wal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie stands underneath the cracked bell, the mouth of t PNEUMATIC TUBES, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FWOOMP! A shocked Winnie gets sucked up a PNEUMATIC TUBE while Eggs watches, bemused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHHHHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs and Winnie (woozy, her hair frazzled from the tube r crawl out of a manhole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They climb the Guild stairs together. Winnie pats down he hair as Eggs lopes past her like a nervous boxtroll. He w his nose with the back of his hand, wipes it on his pants adjusting his disguise as he reaches for the door handle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STOP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs stops, eyes wide. Winnie pushes him away from the do They stop in front of the tall guild door. Sounds of part guests can be heard. Winnie turns to Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't scratch there in public! That's why they're called...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... privates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie looks around to make sure nobody saw that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For this is to work, there are a few things you need to know. When you meet someone, you must look them in the eye and shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs OPENS HIS EYEBALLS STUPIDLY WIDE and WIGGLES HIS HAN in the air like a lunatic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?! Put those down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls his hands down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs puts his left hand out. She slaps it away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shoves his hand into hers -- a proper shake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you say,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "It's a pleasure to meet you."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "It's a pleasure to meet you."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you say that even if you're not pleased to meet them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks confused, but nods yes anyway. A look of doubt comes over Winnie's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just stick close, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She opens the huge doors and the elegant sound of chamber music and civilized conversation pours out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE GUILD DOORS: as a BUTLER holds an enormous cheese out for party guests. Lady Cynthia pierces cheese with he fork and the tray whirls away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that all that is left of the new Roquefort? (trails off)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie enters and Eggs follows her, standing tall and straight like a stiff little wooden soldier. Eggs stares around, curious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which one is your father?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind. He's usually making speeches about cheese.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They search the crowd for Lord Portley-Rind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Winifred!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie stops, forces a smile. Eggs ducks down and covers head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, mommy dear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie's mother, LADY CYNTHIA - a high strung, slender st of a woman - appears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Who is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs peeks out from under his hands and looks up, timidly

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Eggs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Bert. Eggsbert. Is a normal name... that he has.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lady Cynthia looks flustered, but tries to keep up appearances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggsbert. How nice, I... umm, adore names from the bible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lady Cynthia reaches for Winnie's hand, but Eggs suddenly grabs and shakes it vigorously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Its a pleasure to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie winces. Lady Cynthia is flustered as Eggs continue wiggle her arm about. Winnie whispers to Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no. You kiss a lady's hand. (Winnie makes KISS SOUNDS on the back of her hand)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs releases Lady Cynthia. She gasps and straightens, ta Winnie's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darling, it's time to take off that dress and... burn it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lady Cynthia drags Winnie away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't move. I'll be right back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But which ones are the ladies?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks around, finding himself amongst formally dress aristocrats. He tries to slink away but bumps into a coup

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahem!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The couple turns around to stare incredulously at Eggs. H stares at them, agape, then remembers what Winnie taught

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stands very straight and sticks his hand out to Sir Broderick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a pleasure to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir Broderick smiles and shakes his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even if I don't mean it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Well, I never!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir Broderick tries to lead his wife away, but Eggs grabs hand and kisses it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And, it's a pleasure to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two kisses later with no effect, Eggs licks Lady Broderic hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is disgusted and SHAKES HER HANDS in the air to get t lick off. She walks off wailing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs misunderstands her hand shakes as "shaking hands" - bulges out his eyes and waves hands in the air exactly li Winnie told him not to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir Broderick hustles his wife away. Eggs saunters off, shaking his hands at everyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a pleasure to meet you... it's a pleasure to meet you... it's a pleasure to meet youuuuu! Oooooh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs is distracted as a LADYBUG buzzes in. It lands on a flower arrangement in the middle of A TABLE FULL OF CHEES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs grabs the bug and is about to put it in his mouth, w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [GRUNT!]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs turns to see Sir Langsdale putting an OLIVE on a sta of cheese and crackers. Langsdale shoves the stack into h mouth, smacking with approval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs places the ladybug on a CRACKER STACKED WITH CHEESE, then eats it. Sir Langsdale sees him eat the bug and is appalled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmm? Well I could just...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir Langsdale storms off. Eggs doesn't notice. He goes do the table, shoveling various cheeses into his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yum. Mmmthatsgood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (clears throat loudly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks up and sees two aristocrat ladies and Boulange using forks to nibble politely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eww.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lady aristocrat pointedly taps her plate with the fork, signaling to Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? Oh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLARRG! He SPITS the chewed cheese back on to a plate, gr a fork, and gingerly nibbles at the regurgitated food. Th ladybug rests on top then flies away. He shovels a forkfu into his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUD. Ladies faint. Eggs watches them nonchalantly while SMACKING his mouthful of cheese.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and Gentlemen... Lord Portley-Rind!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He puts down the plate and fork quickly as Lord Portley-R appears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs joins the crowd that has gathered around the Cheese Guild staircase as Portley-Rind orates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Distinguished members of the cheese guild. We were here to celebrate the successful fund-raising for a new children's hospital! But my fellow White Hats and I decided the money would be better spent on this. I present: THE BRIEHEMOTH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He whips a sheet off a giant WHEEL OF CHEESE. Everyone ga and applauds. Eggs walks toward the stairs. Suddenly, he grabbed from behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zere you are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Madame Frou Frou's crazily painted face looms over him. People nearby turn and stare. He/She suddenly pulls Eggs away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come. Such a naughty boy! We have so much to discuss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs' eyes go wide as he realizes who it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMACK! Madame Frou Frou covers his mouth, and hugs him cl LIFTING HIM OFF THE GROUND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come to snitch on old Snatcher did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Madame Frou Frou carries him away, he waves to people the crowd as if nothing untoward was happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Frou Frou!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice to see you, too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He/She shoves Eggs through a curtain into--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --The dark corner of a closet. Madame Frou Frou advances Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really think Portley-Rind will help a nobody like YOU? In this town, you want help, you've got to help yourself! That's what a man does!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher adjusts his dress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a liar! When I tell Winnie's father the truth, he'll-- OOF!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs' tries to run out of the closet. Snatcher shoves him the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll THANK ME! Because all your little boxtroll friends are going to die - tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That will make me the most respected man in this town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher talks to himself as he rifles through the coats searching for something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll have no choice but to give me a white hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher finds what he's looking for - a long SCARF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll parade me into the tasting room on their shoulders!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He winds the ends around each fist and snaps it tight as stalks toward Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I'm not going to let that be ruined by some little boxtroll sewer rat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher is about to strangle Eggs when the curtain is suddenly pulled aside and light fills the closet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yoo hoo, Madame Frou Frou... You promised your snookums a dance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (deep Snatcher voice) I did? (as Frou Frou) I did! Ha! But of course!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir Langsdale pulls Madame Frou Frou out of the closet an walks her out on to the dance floor. He gooses her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh! Vatch your hands, monsieur!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS, as he slowly exits the closet. He awkwardly adju his collar as he takes in his surroundings. Couples are joined together in a WALTZ, filling the entrance hall wit activity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks up at Portley-Rind at the top of the stairs, t at the impenetrable wall of dancers. He tries to walk thr the crowd and is nearly trampled. There is no way to get Portley-Rind without causing a scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie runs up, now in a new, clean YELLOW DRESS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to get to your father!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't just cut through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie sizes up the situation: Portley-Rind across the ro the dance floor between them. Suddenly her face brightens

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll dance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll WHAT?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie grabs Eggs by the shoulders and pulls him onto the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Dance floor, joining the swirling lines of waltzing couples.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like this. One two three... one two three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie continues counting the steps as she guides Eggs to center of the dance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just make a box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You made me get out of my box!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With your feet, silly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks down, concentrating very hard.    He gradually catches on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it, Eggs. You're dancing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She laughs. Eggs lets down his guard and joins in laughin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment they forget why they are at the party. They crazily around the room, looking back and forth at each other, until Eggs looks past Winnie and sees Snatcher/Fro Frou glaring at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher is here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who? Where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie sees Madame Frou Frou waltzing with Sir Langsdale. Frou Frou breaks from Langsdale as partners change, lungi toward Eggs. Broderick catches her hand and pulls her bac into the waltz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My turn, Madame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (confused, gasps) Frou Frou?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Eggs and Winnie try waltzing across the floor toward Portley-Rind, but before they can reach the stairs, the d forces them apart. New partners whirl them in opposite directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Eggs ends dancing with Female Aristocrat B, the lady he licked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I uh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Madame Frou Frou heads for Eggs again as partners swap Sir Langsdale, her biggest fan, leaves Lady Cynthia and g her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah ha ha ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Frou Frou/Snatcher grabs Sir Broderick by the face and shoves him away. She grabs Lady Cynthia, pulling her clos with a hand wrapped around her face, dancing directly tow Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (startled, confused) Ooh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh oh! (yells to Eggs) EGGS LOOK OUT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Eggs turns in time to see Frou Frou/Snatcher racing tow him. He ducks under ladies' gowns, crawling across the da floor. As he passes under each lady, their dresses shoot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (SCREAMS!)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Frou Frou/Snatcher whips up ladies' dresses looking for Eggs, until she/he get slapped across the face while peek under a skirt. Frou Frou/Snatcher sees Eggs crawl out fro under a dress, toward the stairs and Lord Portley-Rind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Portley-Rind stands sniffing and caressing his giant cheese, oblivious to the chase happening right below him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Eggs races up the stairs on all fours, his feral side coming through. Frou Frou/Snatcher GRABS his leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind turns in time to see Eggs go totally feral--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is going on here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- and BITE Madame Frou Frou's hand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OWWW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher shoves Eggs and send him flying right into the g cheese wheel. The wheel rocks off its pedestal, and rolls down the stairs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO NO NO NO NOOOO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind chases after the cheese, trying to stop Everyone stops dancing and watches as the cheese wheel ro through the foyer. The butler opens the door and it rolls the front door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Down the Guild steps... through the Market Square... the streets... lower and lower, until it's out of view. W hear a SPLASH as it reaches the river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind stands frozen in shock at the foot of the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have you done!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs begins to speak... haltingly at first... but then growing in confidence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Winnie's Father...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd and Portley-Rind all turn and stare at Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People of the upper world -- Archibald Snatcher has lied to you all!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frou Frou/Snatcher looks at the crowd and GULPS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He told you that boxtrolls are monsters -- that they steal children -- but they don't. They would never hurt anyone. I know because...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks to Winnie.   She nods, encouraging him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because... I am the Trubshaw Baby!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long beat. CLOSE ON LORD PORTLEY-RIND as he seems to be thinking intensely...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know how expensive that cheese was?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We might as well have built a children's hospital!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you hear a word he said?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dismissive, to Winnie) Not now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (points to White Hats) Have you any idea how long it will take my men to fish it out of the river?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The White Hats look worried. Boulanger rolls forward in h wheelchair and adjusts his hearing horn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh. What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eww... the river?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs moves down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you won't listen to me, ask Snatcher himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs PULLS OFF SNATCHER'S WIG. A long beat, as Snatcher l caught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GASP!/ Oh my!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whimpers) You have me. I am not a true red head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sympathy for Frou Frou) Poor woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sympathy for Frou Frou) For shame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now the crowd turns ANGRY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How rude! / The lad's fuddled! / An outrage! / The very thought!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw him bite a bug on a cracker!/ He must hate cheese! / He's a mad man! / I believe her's wearing a lamp shade as a sleeve!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nasty boy! / Oh, he's awful!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the one who crawled under my dress! / I knew he was up to no good the second he goosed me. / My husband is angry so I am too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind angrily climbs the stairs to Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You insult our guest of honor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs the wig away from Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A proper boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is with me father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know this... creature?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's my friend. What he said is

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enough!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winifred!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie gives in and bows her head. Eggs is stunned and hu Portley-Rind turns on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to see you again, do you hear me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he's not a...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave my house. Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs walks slowly down the stairs. As he passes, Frou Frou/Snatcher smiles an evil grin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs glares at Snatcher and walks past Winnie without eve looking at her. She looks heartbroken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd shuffles away from Eggs as he walks out the doo The butler wordlessly shuts it behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The music begins again and the crowd goes back to chattin Portley-Rind hands the wig back to Madame Frou Frou and l her down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zees parties are so confusing. No?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There, there. You poor, poor dear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie watches Lord Portley-Rind pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON a manhole cover. Eggs is opening the cover in th center of the square. They meet at the very spot they fir saw each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs, wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said fathers were supposed to help. That they took care of kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sigh) Well, they're supposed to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People are just mean and selfish. They're monsters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs climbs down into the manhole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not all of us. You aren't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs stops climbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I don't want to be a boy anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs starts down again. Without looking up at her, he ext a hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was a pleasure meeting you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And, Winnie, I really do mean it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie sadly watches Eggs climbs down into the dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish is waiting with the remaining boxtrolls as Eggs spit out of the chute, back into the cavern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They gather around and DRUM THEIR BOXES, excited. Eggs lo at the crowd, frowning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to leave the cavern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls stop drumming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not safe down here anymore. Come on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs pushes through the boxtrolls heading for the pneumat tubes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish follows him, pulling the EGGS box out of his front f and holding it out. The other boxtrolls don't move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs turns back toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said, we have to leave now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls shake their heads and GURGLE nervously.   S shrink away from him as he shouts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher is planning something! We have to get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knickers simpers, rubbing his hands together and pulling box up higher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on let's go. Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls hide in their boxes like scared little kids pulling sheets over their heads during a thunder storm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get up! No! NO! (shaking Knickers out of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't don't just hide! (tries to shake Ink loose) What are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks around for Fish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish, help me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish quickly unfolds Eggs' box and offers it to him, smil Eggs SMACKS the box out of Fish's hands!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO! I'm not a boxtroll!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish shrinks away and hides in his box as Eggs comes clos shaking and whimpering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. I... I didn't mean it. Please come out. Fish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the whole cavern rumbles... dust and pebbles dr from the ceiling and bounce on Fish's box. Eggs stares at ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls look up, confused. The cavern RUMBLES and SHAKES. LIGHTS GO OUT one by one... the giant chandelier

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hole opens in the cavern roof. Spinning blades of a dig machine pierce the ceiling. Large chunks of rock crash do as the enormous MECHA BOX DRILL drops into the cavern!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boulders and dust rain down. Through the murk, Eggs sees huge metal box covered in bits of scrap metal, with gaps revealing an interior of huge gears and cables all spinni and twisting like the guts of a giant watch. The whole machine has an ad hoc, made-from-assorted-scrap-and-junk that is unique to a boxtroll creation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS as his eyes go wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two big spot lights BLAST ON like eyes, and the mecha box drill rises up on three legs. As it rises, it tears walkw and lights from the cavern walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHHHHHH!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it turns, it rips the intricate boxtroll clock from it stalagmite and sends it crashing down. The mecha box look like a monstrous, giant mechanical boxtroll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mecha box's spotlight "eyes" cut through the dust and darkness, catching each fleeing boxtroll, making them instinctively STOP RUNNING and HIDE in their boxes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher's head appears out of the top. He still has his Madame Frou Frou white pancake makeup on, with a slash of crimson lipstick, making him look crazier than ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's that for an entrance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout, Pickles and Gristle emerge from beneath the machin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dramatical!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you mean "dramatic"?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Gristle laughs insanely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher hits a lever and a large MECHANICAL ARM unfolds the drill. Snatcher laughs heartily as he plays with his toy, opening and closing the CLAW at the arm's end. He swings the claw at stalactites, sending them crashing to ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs shoves boxtrolls out of the way as the rocks fall to cavern floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some jump out of the way and Snatcher swings again, sendi the clawed arm into Eggs' nook, smashing the music machin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs drags boxtrolls towards the pneumatic tubes -- but t stay in their boxes refusing to move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get up! That thing will kill you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My, my, what a surprise. Don't look like your little friends wanna run, does it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How strange, how peculiar. No, wait, it's exactly as I expected!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs stacks a group of boxtrolls under the tubes, all of still tucked into their boxes, and pleads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to get up. Please!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEVER GONNA HAPPEN, TRUBSHAW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs turns the anchor switch and the boxes start to rise the tubes. The mecha box's claw arm GRABS the tube and ri it out of the machine. Cocoa falls! There's no way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs jumps out of the way as the mecha claw arm drops the tube overhead. He rights himself and gasps up at Snatcher at the mecha drill controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time to earn my white hat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher pulls another LEVER and releases the VACUUM ARM. slithers toward a group of boxtrolls. Eggs whimpers as Snatcher hits the lever's BUTTON to begin the suction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls in front of Eggs get sucked up by the mecha box's vacuum arm. He tries to hold on a boxtroll mid-suct but it is ripped away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mecha box's vacuum arm turns on other boxtrolls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweets and Knickers grab hold of boulders. Knickers nearl loses his/her bottom box as he/she is hoovered up. Sweets teeth are sucked out of his mouth, then he is sucked up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A panicked Eggs looks around, eyes wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish! Shoe!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs grabs Fish and Shoe by their arms, where they try to hold themselves together. He tries to run with them in to Gristle clubs Shoe toward the vacuum arm with his cricket bat, where he is sucked up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs and Fish huddle together as Snatcher rides up, headlights blaring. Eggs has to shield his eyes from the blinding light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs picks Fish up, wrapping his arms around the box as b he can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO! Please!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give up, Trubshaw! Boxtrolls lost looooong time ago. These miserable pests will never be a match for a man with dream!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MR. GRISTLE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs holds Fish tightly and tries to run but Gristle fire his bolas gun after him. It wraps around them and they fa to the ground. Eggs lands hard and hits his head, knockin him unconscious. Fish peeks out of his box, fretting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs? Eggs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher flips levers and switches, grinding gears and sending flames out of the drill's FURNACE GRILL as the machine stands. He points to Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ACQUIRE THEM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Snatcher stomps away, the Redhats step in and pull Fis out of the bolas rope. Fish's head comes out of his box a screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He HISSES AND BARES HIS TEETH at the Redhats! Pickles and Trout jump back! Gristle knocks Fish unconscious with the butt of his rifle. Trout and Pickles recoil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never seen one do that before!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THAT BOXTROLL WAS MAD!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle walks back toward the mecha box, laughing. Pickle look shocked at Fish's flaccid body. Trout picks up the l Eggs and slings him over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodness always triumphs over evil... right Mr. Trout? (Trout walks away) Mr. Trout?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles picks up Fish and follows Trout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm still sixty to seventy percent certain that's us. A couple of good guys vanquishing evil and all that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS in the mecha drill's CAGE. He lies passed out ato pile of boxtrolls. As the mecha box climbs back up the ho it pushes a huge stalagmite over and the rest of the cave collapses down around it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE THE MECHA BOX CAGE, EGGS' SEMI CONSCIOUS POV: he l at the home he once knew, now destroyed. His eyes close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs wakes to find himself back in his box and in a hangi cage. A figure swings back and forth in the foreground, whispering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jelly. Jelly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs starts and looks up through cage bars - a strange ma hangs upside down by a pair of iron boots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His bright, crazy eyes peek out from a tangled mass of scraggly beard and long hair. This PRISONER stares intent at Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I'm good I get jelly. I like jelly. JELLY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who am I? Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (confused, defeated) I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs turns away. LONG BEAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy? Or Boxtroll?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs doesn't answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dresses like a boxtroll, but, uh... looks like a boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A boy-troll? Yes, or a box-boy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A new species. Never seen before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks toward the sound of footsteps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (humming... then in normal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohhh... nooo boxtrolls!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs watches as Snatcher comes down a dark stairway and w up toward the Prisoner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trubshaw senior loved his kid, same as regular faaaaathers did....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher smacks the Prisoner and tugs on his beard. Eggs' eyes dart back and forth between Snatcher and his long lo father, HERBERT TRUBSHAW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Prisoner) He's my, you're my... are you my father?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JELLY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert chuckles in an unhinged kind of way. Eggs' face falls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was once. Won't get much out of him now, though. A decade hanging upside down scrambled his noodles good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher spins Prisoner Herbert around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (RE: mecha box) Still, did a fine job designing this beauty. Best inventor in town, your dad. Working with the best little builders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher spins Eggs' cage so he can see the Redhats stack the boxtrolls into a pile, underneath a menacing-looking crusher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish and Shoe poke their eyes out above their boxes, then immediately dart back inside, scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no no, don't hide. Fish! Shoe! RUN! Get up, get up and run! Sparky. Sweets, run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yell all you want, boy. They ain't gonna run. You can't change nature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs pants and lowers his head, defeated. More and more boxtrolls are placed on top of each other. The whole pile SHIVERS in fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
