dialogues.text: I'm coming down, men! I want to pull the crushing lever myself! (wistful, to Eggs) It's the little moments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher heads down. Herbert chuckles again. Eggs slowly looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. I see it now! A mutation of nature. Self-imposed metamorphosis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boxboy! You did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You changed your nature. Tell them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert gestures toward the shivering box pile. He still crazy eyes, but for a moment, he stares right at Eggs. Ma he's lucid after all. Eggs can't tell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tried. They won't listen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs turns away from Herbert and bows his head. Snatcher flips a lever, starting the machine. Eggs starts, holding to the bars as he stares intently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did it. You made you. Tell them. Tell them. Tell them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs watches as the gears continue to turn and the crushe rise. The pile of boxtrolls shiver with fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boxboy! BOXBOY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks up and turns to Herbert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Despite being upside down and covered with hair, Herbert looks almost sane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son! They can change. They can do it! Tell them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEAT. Eggs looks from Herbert's face to the still shiveri boxtrolls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish, Fish, everyone! Listen! I'm a boxtroll and I stopped hiding, so you can too! Stand up for yourselves! We can fight back! Don't be afraid anymore. Sparky! Fragile! Get up! Get up and fight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The box pile stops shivering and settles. Are they listen Eggs swings his cage around and he pleads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just stand up and take a step. Please! Do it for me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat. Then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, good speech.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher pulls a lever, and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMASH! The box crusher flattens the entire pile of boxtro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! No! No! NOOOOOO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish, Shoe, Sparky...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert is smiling and mumbling the same thing over and o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look what you did. Look what you did! (laughs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Yeah look what I did. They're crushed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher appears, coming up the stairs. Eggs looks up at Snatcher in horror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Boss, your monsters are all loaded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (staring right at Eggs) All but one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks up, terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wide view of rooftops and chimneys in golden morning light is marred by the SMOKE of a coal furnace. The Mecha Drill makes its way slowly up the hillside town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher's amplified voice booms out of a scratchy loudspeaker and through the sleepy morning streets, rousi the townsfolk. Lights appear in windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hear ye! Hear ye! Good citizens of Cheesebridge, come out of your homes! The curfew has been lifted!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUICK SHOTS OF TOWNSPEOPLE, the reverse of the opening sc of the movie:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A man OPENS his peep-hole and looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Another OPENS his door and looks up as a shadow passes his house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A MOTHER swings her door open and a LITTLE BOY rushes outside to see: Snatcher riding atop the giant mecha dril it lumbers up the winding streets towards Market Square. Trout and Pickles follow behind, with Mr. Gristle riding back of the Mecha Drill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoah! What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Snatcher!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fear not, the monsters have been vanquished! Your streets are SAFE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (VERY MENACING) SAAAFE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout and Pickles walk along behind the machine, amongst gathering crowd, worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The townspeople smile in relief and wonder, and step out their doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The curfew is over?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's incredible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They begin to follow after the mecha drill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Join me! Your purger of pests! Your white knight who has taken back the night!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Snatcher continues his ascension, all kinds of townspeople, women, children, rush to join the parade. Th Mecha Drill's heavy iron legs smash into the cobblestones it walks up the hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd arrives at the stairs of the guild with the mec box. Snatcher beams with pride as he calls out through th whiney loudspeaker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Riiiiind!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door cracks open and Lord Portley-Rind looks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I come bearing the most delightful news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He blinks in amazement at the scene before him - Snatcher atop a giant machine, a huge expectant crowd around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Snatcher, what the devil is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Show him lads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Redhats release the crushed boxes from the cage so th fan out dramatically at the foot of the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flattened to extinction. Every last, slimy one of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd applauds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up at her balcony, Winnie hears the noise and comes out t investigate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your lordship, I said I would not rest until I caught every last boxtroll and I am a man of my word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hits a switch and the mechanical arm swings around to present Eggs, wearing the evil-boxtroll costume Mr. Grist wore in the Madame Frou Frou show. The mask covers Eggs' and his hands are bound behind his box. His feet and hand are covered with grotesque claws.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With this boxtroll, I will end their reign of terror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up on her balcony, Winnie stares at the monster. CLOSE ON EGGS LOGO on its box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EGGS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to crowd, arms wide) I'd say that deserves a white hat, don't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd cheers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A white hat for Mr. Snatcher!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our hero! / Be-hatify the man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind steps nervously forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, well. I'm not sure... We'd have to take a vote...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd begins chanting loudly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in unison, chanting) WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Redhats stand with the crowd, Gristle chanting along them. Pickles and Trout look uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's probably some, uh, paperwork... then have a hat shipped in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher moves the machine forward, dangling the "boxtrol out front, daring Portley-Rind to deny the mob.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Methinks a deed of this magnitude deserves something a bit more... significant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind stares up at him blankly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want YOUR hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My hat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher looks appealingly back at the crowd, who are goo and riled up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in unison, chanting) WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd moves forward, pressing closer to the Cheese Gu stairs. They continue calling for Lord Portley-Rind's hat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHANTING! CHANTING! CHANTING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT! WHITE HAT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind gestures to the crowd to calm down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (through gritted teeth) All right. All right. As soon as that boxtroll is dead, you may have... my... hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind casts down his eyes, beaten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher hits a button and the mecha box is lowered to th ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. And then we can eat cheese together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the Tasting Room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher laughs and climbs down from the mecha drill. Gri has removed his hat and taken a knee, Snatcher uses his h as a step stool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Haha, FOOT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands a REMOTE CONTROL to Trout, who is huddled nervou with Pickles. Gristle stands and returns his hat to his h grinning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do the honors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher strides off towards Portley-Rind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers to Trout) I thought this was all gonna be a show, like with Frou Frou. (pulls out fake mustache) I brought my mustache and everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This really does stretch the limits of the term "hero", doesn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle glares at them. He GROWLS, threateningly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAT! (CLEARS THROAT LOUDLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles quickly puts on his mustache and Trout presses th button to raise the mecha box. Eggs in his monster disgui swings on the chain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher steps in front of Portley-Rind.   He removes his hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Musician, drum-roll!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON the One Man Band, who excitedly strikes up a drum roll

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher tosses his red hat away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Trout! Lower the beast down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout reluctantly maneuvers Eggs over the furnace's mouth Eggs struggles to free himself. He presses a button and t furnace doors OPEN WIDE and white-hot flames pour out of coal fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON EGGS as his eyes widen, flames reflected in them He struggles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher takes a knee, and presents his head. Portley-Rin reluctantly removes his hat, breathing hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Repeat after me: With this hat, I, state your name...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With this hat, I, Archibald Penelope Snatcher...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout begins to lower Eggs into the furnace. He and Pickl are sweating, intensely reluctant to kill the boy. Portle Rind slowly begins to lower the white hat onto Snatcher's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With profound esteem for dairy and dairy products... proudly swear to uphold the dignity of the White Hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hat creeps lower as Portley-Rind matches the last boxtroll's progress toward the flames.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (repeating after Portley-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Proudly swear to uphold the dignity of the White Hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Winnie bursts out the front doors and sees Eggs moving closer and closer to death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father! Father!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not now, Winifred!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exasperated, Winnie runs to Pickles and Trout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STOP! STOP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And henceforth, whereupon and thereupon... the placing of this hat... we shall conclude by... ushering our newest member into a world of privilege, pride, and pasteurized dairy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't, miss. Apologies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're just doing our jobs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your JOBS? Are you pest exterminators or evil henchmen?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (long, hurt gasp) I knew that's how people saw us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS, mumbling against his mouth gag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't have to do this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has a point, Mr. Pickles. This could be our chance for redemption.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second chapter!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People love a flawed hero!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FEET of Eggs' BOXTROLL COSTUME are licked by flames a creeps closer to the furnace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, yes, whatever! Just let him go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles and Trout stare at each other, unsure of what to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON SNATCHER and the white hat hovering so tantalizingly c to his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS as he shuts his lids tightly against the coal fir

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON the One Man Band, who is looking a little tired and sw from a really long drum-roll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back to Trout and Pickles, who smile at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah? (at Mr. Pickles' nod) Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout stops the machine and the mechanical arm reverses i direction, moving Eggs away from the fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (behind the gag) Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher growls as Lord Portley-Rind swiftly pulls his wh hat away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON the One Man Band as he finally stops his drum-roll, an collapses exhausted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout and Pickles turn to Winnie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Redeemed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, miss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle LUNGES IN, seizes the controller.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha HA!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STOP IT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie tries to take the controller from Gristle, but he snaps his teeth at her menacingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle turns the mecha drill arm back on! Eggs resumes h descent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Trout pulls Winnie out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tips of Eggs' boxtroll-suited feet are licked by the flames, and he pulls them up out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle laughs heartily at Eggs' precarious situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha Ha HAAAAA!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the quiet hush of the ceremony, suddenly a faint sound be heard GROWING LOUDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jelly! JELLY! Jelly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle turns to the sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the mouth of the boxtroll costume, Eggs sees--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Snatcher's vehicle comes shooting into the square! covered in boxtrolls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I like Jelly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish is stacked on Shoe in the driver's seat. Fish steers Shoe works the pedals. Herbert sits in Snatcher's seat, laughing in delight, his hair and beard whipping in the w He giggles into the megaphone while the boxtrolls holler cheer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JELLY! Ha ha ha ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs excitedly murmurs through his gag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FISH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck SKIDS to a stop, spilling NAKED BOXTROLLS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOXTROLLS! / And they're NAKED! / AAAAAH! / NAKED TROLLS! / EWW! No wonder they wear boxes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Gristle as he's overrun by naked, angry boxtrolls!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OHH! EWW -- NAKED!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is going on here?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I am befuddled as your lordship! I... I crushed them myself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind places the white hat back on his own head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Evidently not! That was the closest you will ever come to a White Hat. (THEN, twirling his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you enjoyed it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish grabs the mechanical arm remote control from Gristle hands. He uses it to lift Eggs away from the furnace's mo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The naked gaggle of boxtrolls carries Gristle away and th him into a barrel labeled "LEECHES".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish releases Eggs from the mechanical arm, sending him flying into a CHEESE TENT. He tumbles out on to the marke square, covered in Gouda and Swiss. Ecstatic boxtrolls an Winnie swarm him. Off come the gloves and mask and a reli Eggs pops up. Winnie hugs him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're alive! You're all alive! But how?! I saw you crushed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish happily GURGLES his answer. Eggs' face lights up wit joy, reacting to each gurgle like it's a revelation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHEM?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... sorry. He says they were hiding and then they heard me yelling at them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs begging the boxtrolls to save themselves, but this t we see it from the REVERSE ANGLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... We can fight back! Don't be afraid anymore. Sparky! Fragile! Get up! Get up and fight. Stand up! Fight back. Please! Do it for me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What Eggs couldn't see is the boxtrolls, led by a NAKED F squirm out of the back of the boxtroll pile. They are terrified, but they all do it until Knickers freezes at t threshold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, good speech.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish has to grab Knickers and pull him out just as SMASH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We even hear Herbert's laughing and calling out to Eggs a the naked boxtrolls stack together and hide out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boxboy! Look what you did!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish and Eggs hug tightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got out of your boxes! You did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The townspeople peek out of their hiding places, confused

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boy is friends with a boxtroll?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But boxtrolls are monsters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie turns to the townspeople.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boxtrolls aren't monsters. They never ate the Trubshaw Baby, he's right there with Fish and-- (GASPS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie stares at Herbert, the hairy lunatic standing next Eggs. Eggs smiles up at Herbert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your father?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling at Eggs) Look what you did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were right. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jelly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The townspeople stare at Herbert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert Trubshaw?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The inventor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd murmurs angrily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh get out of here. / Snatcher said he was killed. / How can that be? / How is this possible? / He lied to us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher lied!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lied to us and to poor Madame Frou Frou!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone turns toward Portley-Rind as he looks around for Snatcher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Snatcher is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the shrill accent of Madame Frou Frou rises abov the crowd. They look up as the mechanical arm of the mech box drops Snatcher into the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (taunting in Frou Frou's

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We could've been somezing special, but you've broken our agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why is he talking like Madame Frou - Oh my God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I regret so much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher pulls levers and grinds gears again. The crowd g and shrinks away from him. He turns the mecha box toward Portley-Rind and uses the mechanical arm to reach for the white hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Snatcher's voice) I'll take my white hat now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind ducks and weaves to avoid the huge, snapping claw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher gets frustrated and SMASHES THE STAIRS! Portley- sprints off the stairs and out into the square.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind sprints off the stairs and out into the squa as Snatcher SMASHES TENTS WITH THE CLAW! Snatcher drives mecha box, stomping after him and right toward the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RUN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind runs through the square and the mecha b chases him, SMASHING the tent out of the way with its gia iron fist!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The frightened townspeople SCREAM and run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The curfew's back on! IT'S BACK ONNN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO EGGS AND THE GANG as Fish finishes putting on his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No more hiding, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GURGLES "RIGHT!")

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish nods. Eggs turns to Knickers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RIGHT?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knickers flashes his best `angry face' and throws down hi box, preferring to fight in his FRILLY UNDERWEAR!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GURGLES a war cry)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to all the boxtrolls) You built that thing! You can take it apart!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs charges forward with all the boxtrolls!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROAWRRR!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO Portley-Rind cowering behind Snatcher's vehicle, holding his white hat to his head. Snatcher stalks by in background, the mecha box drill sending cobbles flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loooord POORTLEY-RIIIIND!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come out, come out, come out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the mecha box lurches. Snatcher loses his footi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoah whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher looks down and sees boxtrolls climbing up the le tearing pieces off. Shoe hisses at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO shots of hero boxtrolls wreaking havoc on the mach

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Sweets grabs a pulley cable on one of the mecha drill l

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chmeey! @#$%&!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tear it down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweets bites the cable and it snaps in half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Sparky and Bucket remove pieces of the motor and get SHOCKED! They look a little charred as they pull out electrical elements and throw them away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Knickers rages, wailing on the side of the machine in h frilly underpants. He smashes his paws through a piece of sheet metal, pulling out a hose. It releases steam as he the hose triumphantly over his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get your grimy paws off of my machine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher pulls a lever and the furnace ROARS to life, spe flames from the front grill. The boxtrolls near the grill cringe away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher deploys the spinning chassis. The box rotates, picking up speed as the boxtrolls try to hang on. They gr on to each other when they lose grip on the mecha box. Fi holds on to Eggs' ankles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouts to Fish) We need to put out the fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish nods at him. He is knocked by another flying boxtrol into the square.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish lands near Winnie! She scowls and walks off with determination while Fish rubs his aching head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO Portley-Rind still cowering. Hands GRAB THE WHITE OFF OF HIS HEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasp) AHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boxtrolls fly across the square and hit the ground, skidd into tents and store fronts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO Snatcher as he spins around in the mecha drill con seat, laughing like a mad man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Mister Snatcher...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spots Winnie waving the hat and DANCING A WIDE PIROUET Snatcher hits a lever and the spinning slows. He woozily tries to find her, off kilter from the momentum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... how did this hat get alllll the waaayyy out here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher forgets about Portley-Rind and stomps after Winn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You vile little brat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie RUNS as the mecha drill clamors towards her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Pickles and Trout run up beside Winnie, both hatless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps we can be of some assistance, miss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie hands the hat to Pickles and ducks out of the chas He examines the hat while running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So this is what all the fuss is about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles places the white hat on his head and turns to Tro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think, Mr. Trout?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mecha drill leg SMASHES the cobbles beside Pickles.   H tosses the hat to Trout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `Ere you have a go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Pickles tosses it to Mr. Trout, who puts it on momentarily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think white quite suits me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout tosses the hat back to Pickles, teasing Snatcher as mecha leg misses him. He tosses the hat to Winnie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO a wider view of Market Square as Winnie, Pickles, Trout play keep away with the white hat, tossing it aroun like a frisbee. Snatcher spins the mecha box around, tryi to grab the hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ungrateful stooges!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles, now holding the hat, taunts Snatcher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this what you wanted, boss?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles tosses the hat high. It soars past Snatcher's hea Snatcher fails to grasp it, then Lord Portley-Rind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Herbert leaps up and grabs the white hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JELLY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert laughs as he runs around, weaving between the mec drill legs. Portley-Rind chases after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not funny! No, no, no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert gives an extra-jaunty laugh and ducks away from a mecha leg quickly. Portley-Rind runs SMACK into it, falli to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO Gristle as he climbs woozily out of the leech barr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohhhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK ON Herbert as Snatcher keeps up the chase, hot on hi heels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come back, you loony!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herbert runs past Gristle and hands him the hat just as Snatcher swings the massive mechanical arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jelly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HUH?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle gets WHACKED, sending the white hat sailing into air and Gristle sailing across the square.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hat is caught by Winnie. Snatcher chases her, corners and is about to crush her with the arm when the gears GRI in protestation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO Eggs, Shoe, and Oil Can on the mecha arm joint. Th sneer at Snatcher. Shoe giggles as he removes a final gea from the arm. The arm hangs in the air for a moment then suddenly FALLS OFF and CLANGS TO THE GROUND with Shoe and Can!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoops!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GURGLE YELL!)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs watches the arm fall, worried about his friends. He doesn't notice Snatcher looming over him. Furious, Snatch swings a LARGE WRENCH at Eggs' head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop destroying my indestructible machine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs barely ducks out of the way and falls, catching a ho of the arm joint and scrambling up to the front of the bo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher keeps swinging the wrench again - KLANG! -, trac Eggs. He SMASHES the left headlight of the mecha drill an reels back to swing again when--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs grabs onto a lever, pulls it hard, and the mecha box tilts violently back, sending Snatcher tumbling to the ed Smoke starts coming out of the furnace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHHHHH!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs presses the red button and THE VACUUM ARM SWINGS DOW LIKE A GIANT ACCORDION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish, grab hold!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON CUE, Fish and Shoe scream directions. A group of boxtr run up to the vacuum arm and grab hold. They form a caterpillar conga-line to stretch it toward THE CENTER OF SQUARE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GURGLES "PULL!")

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoe pulls the manhole cover away from the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS as he looks out over the square.   Snatcher looms the furnace smoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right! Pull it over there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Snatcher appears behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOU FILTHY MONSTER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher grabs Eggs by the shoulders and forces him down the edge of the mecha drill control booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE BOXTROLLS as Fish grabs the mouth of the vacuum an jumps down into the sewer, dangling ABOVE THE WATER! The vacuum can't reach!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GURGLED) Uh oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IT DOESN'T REACH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IT DOESN'T REACH! PULL IT HARDER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS as Snatcher grasps his neck, threatening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with effort, strangling

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think you can win and live happily ever after! They'll never accept the likes of us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs pushes against Snatcher's chest, trying to get free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON WINNIE, SHOE and the others as they STRAIN to pull the vacuum arm closer. Trout and Pickles have joined in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALL TOGETHER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON the mecha box's legs as they are dragged toward manhole, pushing up cobblestones as they go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WITH Fish as the tube reaches the water. He scrambles up vacuum tube as it crashes into the water, hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MEANWHILE, Snatcher and Eggs struggle, their hands on eac others' throats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm nothing like you. You're the monster!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher pulls him close and GROWLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MONSTER?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher GROWLS and rears back with the wrench! Eggs reac over and SLAMS down the vacuum ON SWITCH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FOOOMP! Water is sucked up in HUGE GULPS that race up the tube!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WATER HITS THE RED HOT FURNACE! BOOM! An EXPLOSION of ste and smoke fills the screen, obscuring our view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE WHITE HAT as it sits on the cobblestones. Lord Por Rind picks it up with a chuckle and places it on his head He twirls his mustache with delight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE MECHA DRILL as it stands still, steam dissipating around its carcass. The vacuum arm is now just a stump of steel and shredded canvas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boxtrolls and townsfolk stare at it through the steam

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LONG BEAT OF SILENCE is broken by shouts:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE'VE DONE IT!/ HUZZAH!/ THREE CHEERS FOR US!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir Langsdale, Sir Broderick, and Sir Boulanger crest the hill at Milk Street, pushing the giant CHEESE WHEEL that rolled into the river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got the cheese. (they see the devastated

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord... Portley-... Rind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stand in the entrance to the destroyed square, jaws agape. Glasses broken, an almost blind Gristle stumbles o looking battered and worn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UGH! I HAVE LOST A LOT OF BLOOD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gristle looks up to see Snatcher and Eggs still clinging the mecha box as it falls toward him! He spots Snatcher a watches as the box gets closer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boss?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Timbeeeeer! The mecha box drill crashes on to Mr. Gristle sends Snatcher and Eggs flying SPLAT! into the GIANT CHEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd watches while Fish runs to look for Eggs in the huge mound of cheese. Suddenly, Eggs GASPS and breaks thr the cheese. Fish rushes to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs? EGGS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The townspeople CHEER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YEEEEAAAAYYY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie beams and runs to join Eggs and Fish when somethin suddenly ERUPTS OUT OF THE CHEESE IN FRONT OF HER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAWR!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YEEEEAAAAYYYY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EEEEWWW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GIANT, SWOLLEN HAND grabs Winnie and pulls her toward -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's pulled himself out of the cheese and he is not in go shape. Think Elephant Man stung by bees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON TROUT and PICKLES. They reel in disgust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eww!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS and FISH: Eggs is dumbstruck.      Fish gags, che full.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind runs up to Snatcher, pleading.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnifred!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The monster snatches Winnie up under his misshapen arm an staggers out of the mound of cheese.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GIF. ME. MY. HAT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind twists his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well... what about Broderick's hat? It's just as white and fluffy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON WINNIE as she squeals in protestation from behind Snatcher's monstrous, swollen hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh take it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind removes his hat and hands it to Snatcher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just let go of my daughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher takes the hat with his sausage fingers. He pulls Winnie closer to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YEAH! ARSHBALL SHNASHER, YOOFINE'LY DONE IT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON, Snatcher's beaming face. He waves the White Hat over his head and does an awful little dance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOW TO THE TASHTING ROOM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON: Portley-Rind's hat being held aloft by one grotesquely swollen hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Men, don your White Hatsh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher lowers the hat onto the top of his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL Snatcher is sitting at the Tasting Room table, sti clutching Winnie under his swollen arm. She whimpers in f

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind, wearing Snatcher's red hat, and Eggs and Fi wearing pilfered white hats, sit on the other side of the table. Fish's hat slips down over his eyes, too big for h pointy head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small, ornately covered cheese tray sits in front of Lo Portley-Rind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, Snatcher, let her go. You don't have to do this--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher interrupts Eggs and slams a meaty fist down on t table!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ISH TASHTING TIME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie whimpers. Portley-Rind, Eggs, and Fish look nervou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awkward silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind clears his throat and gestures to the cheese tray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I present the tastiest cheese known to man. Made from the milk of the male, lactating fruit bats in Borneo. Aged for centuries in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (interrupts, angry) Shut up! Enough shtalling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Portley-Rind lifts the lid off the cheese tray, revealing small greenish portion of powerful looking cheese. A waft stink fills the air and everyone recoils. Fish stabs a fo into the cheese.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs pushes the cheese tray across the table, face drawn disgust. It stops in front of Snatcher. He lifts the fork his ham-sized swollen fist and removes a curd. He gives t cheese a looong SNIFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (snifffff) Yesh... rich bouquet, cheesy cheese-like... OW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie BITES his puffy hand, breaks free of the headlock, runs into the arms of her father. They hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my Winnikens!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher stares at her in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You bit me... wif yor... MOUTH?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs looks at Winnie. She shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher growls, shrugs it off, and raises the forkful of cheese to his mouth... then pauses. His STOMACH GURGLES loudly. Everyone else recoils, scared. Fish hides in his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher raises the cheese to his mouth again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do it. It won't change who you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His hideous, swollen head turns back to Eggs and he blink For a moment he looks sad, almost like he wants to listen Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheese, hats, boxes - they don't make you. You make you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher looks sharply at Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have made me, boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher looks back to the curd, ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is my dessshhtiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher opens his mouth wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON EGGS, WINNIE, FISH, LORD PORTLEY-RIND as Snatcher slow places the curd on his tongue. They are terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher chews loudly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher swallows.    He glances down to his stomach...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs and Fish flinch, expecting something terrible to hap Even Portley-Rind and Winnie cower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything is fine. Everyone relaxes. A feeling of relief washes over Snatcher. His face brightens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm, aromatic?... Oaky?... With an undertone of a mother's smile on a

dialogues.speaker: BOOOOOM
dialogues.text: He explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The top of the Guild explodes with a puff. The sound of t explosion is delayed slightly because of the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat as the smoke hangs in the air. The grazing cows ge MOO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the clear, blue sky over Cheesebridge for a moment before tilting down into Market Square.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There I was, trapped in his sweaty armpit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Madame Frou Frou's cabaret cart has been repainted, with new sign reading "WINNIE". Winnie stands mid-stage oratin her horrific tale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Until he swelled like a balloon and.. POP! --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! A boxtroll bursts out of the trapdoor below the sta releasing a cloud of confetti that explodes everywhere. T perform for a mixed crowd of townspeople and boxtrolls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- An ocean of guts exploded over us like a hurricane of YUCK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd applauds, townspeople clap their hands and boxtrolls drum their boxes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Portley-Rind and Lady Cynthia applaud the loudest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My little angel. My weird little angel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie curtsies deeply, head down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie looks up and spots Eggs standing at the edge of th crowd. Under his arm he is holding an old record album.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly, to Winnie) Where's Fish?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto voce, quietly to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie shrugs, "I don't know" and starts another story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the audience) And now I will tell the heroic story of the Naked Boxtrolls and the Crusher of DOOOOOOM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie gestures to the stage curtain, which moves to reve Knickers - wearing only his knickers - standing beneath a mock cardboard `1 TON' WEIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs walks away from the stage as boxtrolls scramble to g better seats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The   square is cleaned up from the battle and there are new   additions. Eggs spots Oil Can, hard at work lubrica the   cables for the One Man Band's kick drum. Oil Can sm and   they both move on to REVEAL:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tent with a sign for SPARKY'S SCRAP SHACK - a boxtroll appliance repair service - hanging from it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SIR LANGSDALE stands next to his toaster as Bucket and Sp peer inside it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It hasn't worked right in years!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boulanger speeds around the repair tent, making rusty squ with each wheel rotation. An excited Oil can squeals and chases Boulanger's wheelchair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said I like it burnt, then she says well I don't! So here I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Eggs appears next to Langsdale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys seen Fish?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bucket and Sparky grunt "No" and get back to work. They b raise forks and prepare to plunge them into the toaster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs walks away as Langsdale backs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. I... I don't think that's a good idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Eggs walks away, a loud BZZZT sound and a bright light off behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Specs mans a control switch at a BOXTROLL MANHOLE exit. H throws the switch and Sweets shoots up out of the manhole blown by a strong wind. He lands just as Eggs walks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you seen Fish?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Specs shrugs `No' but Sweets brightens--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mushurgle, mushmoogle, mushmushgurgle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He mumbles until his teeth suddenly shoot up out of the manhole. He grabs them, jams them in--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweets walks off. Suddenly the sound of a loud HONK! Eggs looks up as.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh, there he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snatcher's vehicle appears. Herbert is driving and Fish i riding in Snatcher's old seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A new logo has been painted over the old silhouette of a rampaging boxtroll. In its place is a kinder silhouette o boxtroll holding a light bulb, surrounded by a circle mad three arrows - it's the prototype of the international si for recycling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eggs holds up the record - a new copy of the QUATTRO SABATINO'S album from the old music machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look what I found!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish gurgles happily as Eggs hands him the album and clim aboard the vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brilliant, son!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON: The record being put on the player on top of th vehicle. The record begins to play.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish sits back in Snatcher's old seat, Eggs holds on to t side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now we go like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish and Eggs start rocking out, bobbing their heads to t music like they used to. Fish and Eggs hum to the tune.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh. I've missed so much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He joins them in the head-bobbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE: As the music swells we follow the vehicle as it win it's way across the market and away through the arch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the music fades away, two familiar silhouettes pause f sweeping up some trash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aww, ain't that lovely?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trout empties his dust bin into a TRASH BARREL. A loud snuffle can be heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... all happy `n tidy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoe sticks his head out of the barrel, covered in dust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like the end of a story, if our lives were a story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoe climbs out of the barrel. He pulls Lord Portley-Rind white hat out of the trash. It is filthy and torn. Shoe frowns at it, tears a frilly ribbon off the top, and toss the rest back in the trash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not sure what we'd do next, though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoe looks around defensively, grunts quietly, and scampe to the center of Market Square. We follow him into the da as he jumps down an open manhole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles and Trout are still awkwardly standing around, no sure what to do next.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just keeping the streets clean...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Free from evil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ya ever think about the universe, Mr. Trout?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera pulls out gradually --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if our world is just like a tiny speck...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tiny little speck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And there are giants looking down on us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And every time we move...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's actually them moving us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Revealing that Market Square is a set.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles and Trout stare at each other. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems a bit tedious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pickles blinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like that, just there, me blinking. That would've taken them a day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera keeps pulling out and lights and the stage tab can be seen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me moving my arm. Five hundred men!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, none of them are going home. They're having to do this bit. And now this bit. And this bit. I mean, this should stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it throws up notions of free will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too much. And then they'd have had to've done me talking about the blink. And it never ends. I think they make a meal of it, to be honest. I don't know how they get the time. They've got to have other jobs. It's more like a hobby. Y'know, like stamp collecting, something you do in your free time.
